Module progettofinale.sailingclub
Package progettofinale.sailingclub.controller

Class MemberController

java.lang.Object
progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.Controller
progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.MemberController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MemberController extends Controller implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The class MemberController represent the controller where we can control all the buttons and functionality of the Member fxml file. This class inherit from Controller class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    checkPayment()
    This method requests the server to verify the payments made by the member and if the member has made all the required payments the server removes the non-payment notifications.
    void
    handleAddBoat()
    This method is used to add a boat type object to the server database and then the added boat is displayed in the GUI table.
    void
    handlePayMembership(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method is used by the button of the Member.fxml file called "Pay Fee" to pay the membership fee, the payment is managed by the PaymentController and Payment.fxml file
    void
    handlePayStorage(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method is used by the button of the Member.fxml file called "Pay Storage" to pay the storage fee for each boat identified with its id, the payment is managed by the PaymentController and Payment.fxml file
    void
    handleRmvBoat()
    This method is used to remove a boat type object from the server database and consequently from the respective GUI table.
    void
    handleSubscribe(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method is used to register a specific boat in a specific race, first you need to make the registration payment managed by the Payment.fxml and PaymentController.java file.
    void
    initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    This method is used initialize a controller after its root element has been fully processed.
    void
    readBoat()
    This method requests the server for the list of boats of a specific member and then adds the list of boat names in the combobox named choiceBoat.
    void
    readInscription()
    This method requests the server for the list of participation in the races of a specific member and then displays the list in the GUI thanks to the printListFX method.
    void
    viewBoatQuote()
    This method is used to display the list of boats with the following parameters id, name, storage fee and date of payment of the fee of a particular member in the GUI, thanks to the printListFX method.
    protected String
    viewExpire()
    This method is used to make a request to the server and receive the membership fee expiration date or a string if the date has already expired.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method is used initialize a controller after its root element has been fully processed.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - It is the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object or null if the location is unknown.
      resourceBundle - It is the resources used to locate the root object or null if the root object has not been located.

    • viewExpire

      protected String viewExpire()
      This method is used to make a request to the server and receive the membership fee expiration date or a string if the date has already expired.
      Returns:
      returns the expiration date or a string that says "expired"

    • handleAddBoat

      public void handleAddBoat()
      This method is used to add a boat type object to the server database and then the added boat is displayed in the GUI table.

    • handleRmvBoat

      public void handleRmvBoat()
      This method is used to remove a boat type object from the server database and consequently from the respective GUI table.

    • readBoat

      public void readBoat()
      This method requests the server for the list of boats of a specific member and then adds the list of boat names in the combobox named choiceBoat.

    • readInscription

      public void readInscription()
      This method requests the server for the list of participation in the races of a specific member and then displays the list in the GUI thanks to the printListFX method.

    • handleSubscribe

      public void handleSubscribe(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used to register a specific boat in a specific race, first you need to make the registration payment managed by the Payment.fxml and PaymentController.java file.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that causes the scene change.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

    • viewBoatQuote

      public void viewBoatQuote()
      This method is used to display the list of boats with the following parameters id, name, storage fee and date of payment of the fee of a particular member in the GUI, thanks to the printListFX method.

    • handlePayStorage

      public void handlePayStorage(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is used by the button of the Member.fxml file called "Pay Storage" to pay the storage fee for each boat identified with its id, the payment is managed by the PaymentController and Payment.fxml file
      Parameters:
      event - The event that causes the scene change.

    • handlePayMembership

      public void handlePayMembership(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used by the button of the Member.fxml file called "Pay Fee" to pay the membership fee, the payment is managed by the PaymentController and Payment.fxml file
      Parameters:
      event - The event that causes the scene change.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

    • checkPayment

      public void checkPayment()
      This method requests the server to verify the payments made by the member and if the member has made all the required payments the server removes the non-payment notifications.
